mapper.insert: insert into pms_brand( name, pinyin, logo, description, keywords, sort, sales, product_count, comment_count, positive_comment_count, enable, gmt_create, gmt_modified) values( #{name},#{pinyin},#{logo},#{description},#{keywords}, #{sort},#{sales},#{productCount},#{commentCount},#{positiveCommentCount}, #{enable},#{gmtCreate},#{gmtModified} )
mapper.update: update pms_brand set name =#{name} where id=#{id}
